mapper.select: select DISTINCT t5.sgmfid, t5.sgmf_name sgmfName, t5.sgmf_sort sgmfSort, t5.sgmf_type sgmfType, t5.create_date createDate, t5.create_by createBy, t5.update_date updateDate, t5.update_by updateBy, t5.valid_flag validFlag, t5.sgmf_icon sgmfIcon, t5.is_redpaper_usable isRedpaperUsable from t_purchase_orders_detail t1 INNER JOIN t_supplier_goods t2 on t1.goods_id = t2.goods_id INNER JOIN ehu.t_store_goods_info t3 on t2.sgiid = t3.sgiid INNER JOIN ehu.t_store_goods_menu_second t4 on t3.sgmsid = t4.sgmsid INNER JOIN ehu.t_store_goods_menu_first t5 on t4.sgmfid = t5.sgmfid WHERE t1.purchase_order_id = #{orderId}

select DISTINCT t4.sgmsid, t4.sgms_name sgmsName, t4.sgms_sort sgmsSort, t4.sgmfid sgmfid, t4.create_date createDate, t4.create_by createBy, t4.update_by updateBy, t4.valid_flag validFlag from t_purchase_orders_detail t1 INNER JOIN t_supplier_goods t2 on t1.goods_id = t2.goods_id INNER JOIN ehu.t_store_goods_info t3 on t2.sgiid = t3.sgiid INNER JOIN ehu.t_store_goods_menu_second t4 on t3.sgmsid = t4.sgmsid INNER JOIN ehu.t_store_goods_menu_first t5 on t4.sgmfid = t5.sgmfid and t5.sgmfid = #{firstMenuId} WHERE t1.purchase_order_id = #{orderId}

SELECT t3.supplier_name supplierName, t1.goods_name goodsName, t1.order_quantity orderQuantity, t1.order_price goodsPrice FROM t_purchase_orders_detail t1 LEFT JOIN t_supplier_goods t2 on t1.goods_id = t2.goods_id LEFT JOIN t_supplier t3 on t2.supplier_id = t3.supplier_id WHERE t1.purchase_order_id = #{orderId}
